author: Saabira Chaudhuri
title: Kraft Heinz Prepares to Take On Hellmann’s With a New Mayonnaise and ‘Mayochup’
text:
It’s mayhem in the mayonnaise aisle.
Hellmann’s maker Unilever PLC and Kraft Heinz Co., which owns Miracle Whip, are cutting prices and slinging out new concoctions as they battle changing eating habits, a dizzying array of new players and each other.
The two, which together account for more than 80% of U.S. mayonnaise sales, are duking it...
